summary: A man named Elijah, a fashion designer, showcases a purse he designed called the "Alphonsine purse," named after his daughter. The purse is modular, with interchangeable color panels that can be zipped on and off. It can be worn as a handbag or a crossbody bag.
transcript: my name is Elijah and I'm a self-taught fashion designer and today is day one of me showcasing my fashion designs. This is a purse that I made. I call it the Alphonsine purse. Alphonsine is my daughter's name. It's fully interchangeable and you can wear it like a handbag or crossbody bag. Let's say you want to switch out these colors. You simply unzip. you get your side collar part. You just zip it on as simple as that. and it has two magnet closure right here so your things won't fall out. You can wear it like a handbag or a crossbody bag. Just like that. So what do you think of the Alphonsine purse?
